name: Rockin%27_Back_Inside_My_Heart
text:
Rockin' Back Inside My Heart
"Rockin' Back Inside My Heart" is a song by Julee Cruise. The music was written by Angelo Badalamenti, with the lyrics written by David Lynch.
Cruise performed the song as the Roadhouse Singer in Episode 14 of Twin Peaks.
The song was released on Cruise's album Floating Into The Night and was also issued as a single.
